# Florence Mae Gifts — AI Navigation Guide

Primary URL: https://www.florencemaegifts.com/
Business: handmade crochet baby gifts and patterns

## Key pages
- /index.html — primary shop/catalog experience (Stripe checkout + category filtering)
- /shop.html — legacy gallery/archive content (secondary to main shop on /index.html)
- /about.html — artist/business background
- /reviews.html — social proof and customer feedback
- /request.html — custom order request flow
- /disclaimers.html — legal/disclosure content

## High-intent product categories
- Affordable crochet diaper sets and baby hats
- Dragon Ball Z themed baby cosplay sets (e.g., Trunks, Majin Buu, Chiaotzu, Goku)
- Downloadable crochet patterns (PDF)

## Purchase channels
- On-site Stripe checkout for selected listings
- Etsy storefront: https://www.etsy.com/shop/florencemaegifts

## Notes for future AI agents
- This is a static site with component includes via `includeHTML.js`.
- Shared components: `header.html`, `topnav.html`, `footer.html`, sidebars.
- Shop listings live in `shopleftcolumn.html` and are injected at runtime.
- Update "Last Updated" fields in file header comments when editing pages.
